channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump pardons ex-NYPD officer who was convicted of helping China stalk an expat
item.description: President Donald Trump has granted a pardon to a former New York police sergeant who was convicted of helping China try to scare an ex-official into g...

item.title: Progressives warn Democrats about alienating the left as they jeer key party leader
item.description: Democrats are riding high after Election Day wins and some are capitalizing on the victory of New York City Mayor-Elect Zohran Mamdani

item.title: Florida sets execution date for man who fatally stabbed woman during home invasion robbery
item.description: A man convicted of fatally stabbing a woman during home invasion robbery is scheduled to be put to death in December

item.title: DC Mayor Bowser is not the target of Justice Department investigation, officials say
item.description: The Justice Department is scrutinizing a trip that Washington, D.C., Mayor Muriel Bowser took to Qatar, but the mayor is not a target of the investiga...

item.title: The government shutdown prompts the cancellation of some Veterans Day events
item.description: Volunteers usually gather at Riverside National Cemetery in California on Veterans Day to place flags on graves, but not this year
